data.title: Back To The Beach (1988) Special Edition CD Soundtrack
data.meta_description: A soundtrack for the film BACK TO THE BEACH was released originally in 1988 on cassette and CD. The title was quickly out-of-print after the film tanked at the box office. There has been no reissue in any format. This special edition soundtrack contains twelve additonal songs as heard in the film. 01. Eddie Money – Catch A Ride02. Stevie Ray Vaughan – Pipeline03. Aimee Mann – Sign Of Love04. Private Domain – Absolute Perfection05. Pee-wee Herman – Surfin’ Bird06. Marti Jones – Sun, Sun, Sun, Sun, Sun07. Annette Funicello & Fishbone – Jamaica Ska08. Herbie Hancock – Wipe Out09. Frankie Avalon – California Sun10. Dave Edmunds – Wooly Bully      BONUS TRACKS11. Jan & Dean – Catch A Wave12. Edge Of Etiquette – I Hate You13. Chubby Checker – Limbo Rock14. Little Eva – The Loco Motion15. Percy Faith – The Lonely Bull16. Annette Funicello & The Nooney Ricket 4 – Pajama Party17. John Williams – The Raiders March18. The Lettermen – Theme From A Summer Place19. Frankie Avalon – Venus20. The Slickee Boys – When I Go To The Beach21. Doris Day – Que Sera, Sera (Whatever Will Be, Will Be)22. Cast – Some Things Live Forever*      * denotes audio sourced from dvd
data.text:
A soundtrack for the film BACK TO THE BEACH was released originally in 1988 on cassette and CD. The title was quickly out-of-print after the film tanked at the box office. There has been no reissue in any format. This special edition soundtrack contains twelve additonal songs as heard in the film.

01. Eddie Money – Catch A Ride

02. Stevie Ray Vaughan – Pipeline

03. Aimee Mann – Sign Of Love

04. Private Domain – Absolute Perfection

05. Pee-wee Herman – Surfin’ Bird

06. Marti Jones – Sun, Sun, Sun, Sun, Sun

07. Annette Funicello & Fishbone – Jamaica Ska

08. Herbie Hancock – Wipe Out

09. Frankie Avalon – California Sun

10. Dave Edmunds – Wooly Bully

BONUS TRACKS

11. Jan & Dean – Catch A Wave

12. Edge Of Etiquette – I Hate You

13. Chubby Checker – Limbo Rock

14. Little Eva – The Loco Motion

15. Percy Faith – The Lonely Bull

16. Annette Funicello & The Nooney Ricket 4 – Pajama Party

17. John Williams – The Raiders March

18. The Lettermen – Theme From A Summer Place

19. Frankie Avalon – Venus

20. The Slickee Boys – When I Go To The Beach

21. Doris Day – Que Sera, Sera (Whatever Will Be, Will Be)

22. Cast – Some Things Live Forever*

* denotes audio sourced from dvd
